Package com.burstly.lib.component

Package contains interfaces and abstractions for different types of ad components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComponentQueue.IQueueComponentListener This interface is used to notify when active component has been changed.
IAdaptorController Interface describes adaptor controller.
IAdaptorController.IComponentQueueLifecycleListener This interface describes Control life cycle.
IBurstlyAdaptor This interface should be implemented by an ad network adaptor.
IBurstlyAdaptorListener This interface should be used by third party SDK in order to integrate into Burstly SDK.
IClickTracker Implemetors are used to get ITrackClickResponseHandler instance to track server response.
IInternalBurstlyAdListener This interface is used by Burstly sdk internally.
ITrackClickResponseHandler This interface should be implemented by an ad network adaptor.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAdaptor Abstraction of adaptor.
AdaptorCache Adaptor cache.
AdaptorCustomFullscreen This class is used as an adaptor of FrameLayout to IActivityLifeCycleAware interface.
AdaptorFactoryCache Cache of IAdaptorFactory instances.
AdaptorListener Home implementation of adaptor listener interface.
BurstlyAdaptorController Burstly adaptor controller.
BurstlyAdaptorListenerWrapper Simple wrapper class that delegates calls to underlying object.
ComponentFactory This is a factory that builds components based upon incoming server response.
ComponentQueue This class holds components execution queue.
ComponentQueueElement Component queue element.
ComponentState Holds a snapshot of current state of a component.
CustomInterstitialStarter Shows custom view as an interstitial view.
FailedToShow This class represents component that was failed to show.
IBurstlyAdaptorListener.FullscreenInfo This class is used to provide info about opened/closed fullcreen creative instance.
LayoutParametersResolver Resolves layout parameters from server response.
 

Enum Summary
IBurstlyAdaptor.AdaptorAction Enumeration describes actions that are not suported "out-of-the-box".
IBurstlyAdaptor.BurstlyAdType Enumeration describes supported ad types.
IBurstlyAdaptor.TransactionCode Enumeration describes supported transaction codes.
 

Package com.burstly.lib.component Description

Package contains interfaces and abstractions for different types of ad components.

Since:
1.0
